verbs.description: i [V: 've] slept on several different beds - in - a - box leesa hybrid sapira mattress may be pricier than most on the market but in my opinion the combination of innersprings and memory foam makes it one of the most comfortable mattresses out there read on for my review of the hybrid sapira mattress and the foundation that came with it leesa foundation leesa sleepopolis leesa mattress leesa sapira sapira mattress sapira leesa adjustable base
